content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnace operations
- Ensure that each furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt. Currently, some furnaces are reporting "no ingredients to smelt."
- Check the output inventory of the furnaces; if they are full, they will not be able to process new items. This can lead to inefficiencies in production.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
